Column.Name: COLONY
Description: Colony number

Column.Name: PlantID
Description: Plant ID number

Column.Name: Sex_t
Description: Sexual status of shoot in year t

Column.Name: Sever
Description: Location of experimental severing
Levels.or.units: C: control; S1: sever behind year t shoot; S2: sever behind year t-1 shoot; S4: sever behind year t-3 shoot

Column.Name: Time
Description: Timing of experimental severing
Levels.or.units: T1: April 15-20, year t; T2: June 25-30, year t; T3: September 5-10, year t

Column.Name: Lf_t
Description: Leaf area of the year t shoot

Column.Name: ST-BOR-t
Description: Presence of damage by stem boring larvae

Column.Name: DMG-t
Description: Presence of other types of damage

Column.Name: Total_nodes
Description: Total number of nodes/rhizome segments on main system
Notes: A value of 11 indicates that the total number was not known and the system had more segments than 5

Column.Name: SexF_t1
Description: Overall sexual status of the front system in year t+1
Levels.or.units: S: one or more shoots were sexual; V: all shoots were vegetative; NA: no active shoots

Column.Name: brnoF_t1
Description: Number of branches produced by front system in year t+1
Notes: Used to analyze shoot production in analyses

Column.Name: SexB_t1
Description: Overall sexual status of the back system in year t+1
Levels.or.units: S: one or more shoots were sexual; V: all shoots were vegetative; NA: no active shoots

Column.Name: brnoB_t1
Description: Number of branches produced by back system in year t+1
Notes: Used to analyze shoot production in analyses

Column.Name: LfFtot_t1
Description: Leaf area of the year t+1 front shoot
Notes: NA values indicate a shoot was produced but leaf area was not measured

Column.Name: LfBtot_t1
Description: Leaf area of the year t+1 back shoot
Notes: NA values indicate a shoot was produced but leaf area was not measured

Column.Name: Lftot_t1
Description: Total leaf area of the year t+1 front and back shoots
Notes: NA values indicate a shoot was produced but leaf area was not measured (in front and/or back system)

Column.Name: SexF_t2
Description: Overall sexual status of the front system in year t+2
Levels.or.units: S: one or more shoots were sexual; V: all shoots were vegetative; NAN: no active shoots; NA: system was not measured in year t+2

Column.Name: brnoF_t2
Description: Number of branches produced by front system in year t+2
Notes: NA values indicate the system was not measured in year t+2

Column.Name: SexB_t2
Description: Overall sexual status of the back system in year t+2
Levels.or.units: S: one or more shoots were sexual; V: all shoots were vegetative; NAN: no active shoots; NA: system was not measured in year t+2

Column.Name: brnoB_t2
Description: Number of branches produced by back system in year t+2
Notes: NA values indicate the system was not measured in year t+2

Column.Name: LftotF_t2
Description: Leaf area of the year t+2 front shoot
Notes: NA values indicate the system was not measured in year t+2

Column.Name: LftotB_t2
Description: Leaf area of the year t+2 back shoot
Notes: NA values indicate the system was not measured in year t+2

Column.Name: Lftot_t2
Description: Total leaf area of the year t+2 front and back shoots
Notes: NA values indicate the system was not measured in year t+2
